foods.name: Pepperoni Pizza
foods.description: A classic favorite, our pepperoni pizza features a crispy, golden crust topped with rich tomato sauce, a generous layer of melted mozzarella, and perfectly seasoned pepperoni slices. Baked to perfection, each bite delivers a savory and satisfying experience with just the right hint of spice. Perfect for sharing or savoring solo!

foods.name: Vegetarian Pizza
foods.description: Our delicious Vegetarian Pizza is loaded with fresh, colorful veggies atop a hand-tossed crust. Featuring a savory tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and a medley of toppings like bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, black olives, and juicy tomatoes. This pizza is a delightful blend of flavors and textures, perfect for veggie lovers looking for a hearty, satisfying slice!

foods.name: Meat Lovers Pizza
foods.description: Our Meat Lovers Pizza is a hearty delight piled high with premium meats for a bold, savory experience. Enjoy a golden, crispy crust topped with zesty tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and a mouthwatering mix of pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon. Each bite is packed with rich, smoky flavors that make this pizza a must-have for meat enthusiasts!

foods.name: Hawaiian Pizza
foods.description: Our Hawaiian Pizza is a perfect blend of sweet and savory, featuring a crispy crust layered with rich tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella, and a delicious combination of juicy pineapple and smoky ham. Each bite offers a refreshing twist of tropical sweetness balanced with the savory flavors of melted cheese and ham. Its a unique, crowd-pleasing choice for those who love a little sweetness on their pizza!
